speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark calling from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm doing well, thanks. What is this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I appreciate your time. This call is regarding a debt with ABC Bank. Before we proceed, could you please verify your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that information. Can you also confirm your current address?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, I live at 123 Main St, Springfield.

speaker: Agent
text: Great, I can confirm your identity now. You have an outstanding balance of $250. What payment option would you prefer?

speaker: Customer
text: I would like to set up a payment plan.

speaker: Agent
text: Sure, we can arrange that. Would you be able to pay $50 a month for the next five months?

speaker: Agent
text: Perfect! I’ll set that up and send you a confirmation email. Thank you for your cooperation.

speaker: Agent
text: You’re welcome! Have a great day.
